requirements.plaintext: The Subterranean Trials of Drake and Serpent

steps.plaintext: First obtain the Golden Bridle during the World Quest The Subterranean Trials of Drake and Serpent and change to Evernight.
steps.markdown: First obtain the ◀Golden Bridle▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Golden_Bridle▷ during the World Quest ◀The Subterranean Trials of Drake and Serpent▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/The_Subterranean_Trials_of_Drake_and_Serpent▷ and change to ◀Evernight▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Evernight▷.

steps.plaintext: Glide down north from The Serpent's Heart northwest-most waypoint.
steps.markdown: Glide down north from ◀The Serpent's Heart▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/The_Serpent%27s_Heart▷ northwest-most waypoint.

steps.plaintext: Along the cliff of the north side of the island, there is a cave.
steps.markdown: Along the cliff of the north side of the island, there is a cave.

steps.plaintext: Enter the cave, turn left and glide towards the walls, roughly with your back to the fishing spot in the middle of the cave.
steps.markdown: Enter the cave, turn left and glide towards the walls, roughly with your back to the fishing spot in the middle of the cave.

steps.plaintext: One of the walls is missing a large part, resulting in a V-shaped gap. Climb through that gap. Don't jump down immediately.
steps.markdown: One of the walls is missing a large part, resulting in a V-shaped gap. Climb through that gap. Don't jump down immediately.

steps.plaintext: Glide down on the left side towards the Ruin Sentinel that is by a Time Trial Challenge.
steps.markdown: Glide down on the left side towards the Ruin Sentinel that is by a ◀Time Trial Challenge▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Time_Trial_Challenge▷.

steps.plaintext: Activate the Altar Pattern that was behind the Ruin Sentinel
steps.markdown: Activate the ◀Altar Pattern▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Altar_Pattern▷ that was behind the Ruin Sentinel

steps.plaintext: Return to The Altar at The Serpent's Heart and enter the Altar Pattern from the previous step.
steps.markdown: Return to ◀The Altar at The Serpent's Heart▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/The_Altar_at_The_Serpent%27s_Heart▷ and enter the Altar Pattern from the previous step.
